author: Caitlyn Davison
text:
What is your small town or rural community doing to attract and retain newcomers? My recent blog post identifies the trend of newcomers, but it seems very few communities are responding proactively.
Read more on the trend here: http://www.communitymatters.org/blog/brain-drain-or-brain-gain-new-narrative-rural-america
title: Small Town Newcomers Equal Opportunity
